summary: This is an email from attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (ECF filing) related to the Epstein case, specifically referencing a letter concerning victims (VICs). It includes a confidentiality notice and updated contact information.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: The sender of the email, an attorney from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, who is transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Court Filing Submission
events.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim files a document with the court (ECF filing) and sends a courtesy copy via email. The attached file is named 'Letter re VICs 8-I8-18.pdf', indicating it concerns victims.

keyFacts: Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim is actively involved in legal proceedings related to the Epstein case as of August 2021.
The communication involves a court filing concerning victims (VICs), indicated by the attached filename 'Letter re VICs 8-I8-18.pdf'.
The document is an email correspondence that includes a standard legal confidentiality notice.
The email serves to notify recipients of Sternheim's new office address and preferred email address.
